parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.82

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Arrays

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Searches for an element within array for which the code evaluates to true.
Returns the zero-based index on success or -1 if not found.<br>
Code on the right side of the command is evaluated for each element of the array, processed element can be referenced in code as [[Magic Variables#x|_x]].

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Informative</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>[[findIf]] terminates as soon as it finds an element that fulfills the condition, thus it is more efficient than [[count]] in scenarios where you need to check for presence / absence of at least one element that evaluates to true.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> array [[findIf]] code

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> array: [[Array]] - array to search in

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> code: [[Code]] - code defining an element to find, processed element can be referenced within the code as [[Magic Variables#x|_x]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Number]] - Zero-based position of the first array element for which the code evaluate to true, -1 if not found

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[unit1, unit2, unit3] [[findIf]] {[[not]] [[alive]] [[Magic Variables#x|_x]]}; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>return index of the first dead unit)</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code><template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>two ways how to 'wait for all units to be dead':</value></part></template>
[[waitUntil]] { [unit1, unit2, unit3] [[findIf]] {[[alive]] [[Magic Variables#x|_x]]} == -1 }; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>fast, terminates as soon as it finds a living unit</value></part></template>
[[waitUntil]] { {[[alive]] [[Magic Variables#x|_x]]} [[count]] [unit1, unit2, unit3] == 0 }; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>slow, always goes through all array elements</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[find]] [[count]]
</value></part></template></root>
